title: Understanding Depression
text: Depression is more than just feeling sad. It involves a persistent feeling of sadness and a lack of interest in activities that were once enjoyable.

title: Characteristics of Depression
text: Depression can affect how you feel, think, and handle daily activities, such as sleeping, eating, or working.

hintAnswer: feelings of sadness and/or loss of interest in activities once considered enjoyable
title: Identifying Depression
text: Which of the following best describes depression?
choices: feelings of sadness and/or loss of interest in activities once considered enjoyable
recurrent illness that involves changes in mood and energy that may be severe and involves both depression and mania, or hypomania
condition in which a person’s mood is abnormally elevated and is accompanied by high energy or activity
Mental health conditions characterized by persistent feelings of sadness, loss of interest in activities, and difficulties in carrying out daily activities
